name: Tidivide
description:
The explosive fish have arrived!

They aim to cause chaos at the shore, destroying trees and scattering sand all around the area!

But Gunther isn't tolerating any of these fish. Not on his beach!

CONTROLS:

You can either play this game with a Computer or a Mouse.

Computer: Use the Left Mouse Button

Mobile: Tap the touchscreen 

Liluo.io version: https://liluo.io/dwubbersdacoder/tidivide
